Home.title: Donoghteh:
Home.preParagraph: Wherever our clients have a need, we get things moving, Welcome to Donoghteh:
Home.paragraph: Donoghteh is a community of talented creative thinkers, who have not forgotten the importance of taking on the hardest challenges with the best attitudes focusing on private equity and venture capital like never before in a different angle. Our teams of optimists, artists and first-movers coalesce around the needs of our clients, unlocking unique possibilities for sustainable value and lasting change.

ContactUs.title: Contact Us
ContactUs.address: Address: Unit 72, No. 5, Sobhan Building, Shourideh St., Keshavarz Blvd., Valiasr Sq., Tehran, Iran.

DigitalMarketing.title: Digital Marketing
DigitalMarketing.paragraph: There ’ s a whole range of reasons we ’ re going to be leaders. Using research, insight and strategy, Donoghteh enables innovative, creative, compelling campaigns and builds digital capabilities for its clients who don't have an integrated plan to support digital transformation and company growth, and engage their audiences effectively online.

ContentCreation.title: Content Creation
ContentCreation.paragraph: We change the way you define yourself. That ’ s a promise. Donoghteh uses the power of creativity to create emotion at scale to help brands be more easily remembered and emotion in context. With plenty of customization in mind, we'll make sure that your brand is ready to take the world!

FilmAndSeries.title: Film And Series
FilmAndSeries.paragraph: We, in Donoghteh, have been trying for years to bring to screen the human stories at the heart of the businesses that are driving change and fuelling growth through venture capital. The way we see it, if you are going to stay late, fight for ideas and make the best work of your life you may as well do it with people you like.

Team.title: Pleasure to work with
Team.paragraph: We, in Donoghteh, have been trying for years to bring to screen the human stories at the heart of the businesses that are driving change and fuelling growth through venture capital. The way we see it, if you are going to stay late, fight for ideas and make the best work of your life you may as well do it with people you like.
